Uses of ResourceLocator in org.greatage.ioc.resource
 

Classes in org.greatage.ioc.resource that implement ResourceLocator
 class AbstractResourceLocator
          This class represents abstract ResourceLocator implementation that uses configured root resource for retrieving other resources.
 class ClasspathResourceLocator
          This class represents ResourceLocator implementation that works with classpath resources.
 

Constructors in org.greatage.ioc.resource with parameters of type ResourceLocator
MessagesSourceImpl(ResourceLocator resourceLocator)
          Creates new instance of message source that uses ResourceLocator service to locate message bundles, reads them in UTF-8 encoding and creates MessagesImpl instance as result.
